QuestData.Title: It's a Trap!
QuestData.Description: There's nothing more that I hate in this world than the sons of Gruul and their father! They slaughtered my people, and my children, and now I will have a taste of revenge!$B$BI have fashioned a trap from some dragon fire, and if you're clever enough, you might just be able to use it to kill a gronn.$B$BI'm sure that you have a particular gronn in mind; it matters not to me which one you kill. Just hurry, take the trap to your Commander Stonewall.$B$BMy thirst for revenge must be quenched!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Dragonfire Trap to Commander Haephus Stonewall at Evergrove in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did the baron fashion us a trap? One powerful enough to kill a gronn?
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm, a trap fashioned from the essence of dragon flame? I wonder how Sablemane comes by such rarified substances?$B$BIt does not matter. What does matter is that we are going to use it to slay a son of Gruul!
